summary: Bitcoin mining stocks were higher on Monday.
title: Bitcoin mining report: Jan. 9
content: Bitcoin mining stocks tracked by The Block were higher on Monday, with 18 gaining and the other one declining.
Bitcoin rose 1.6% to $17,234 by market close.
